document.full_text: the u.s. department of justice is seeking records about american clients of hsbc  in india who might be evading taxes, broadening the government's probe of banks suspected of helping tax dodgers.
document.title: u.s. seeks tax client data from hsbc india
lines_and_colors: the u.s. department of justice is seeking records about american clients of hsbc  in india who might be evading taxes, broadening the government's probe of banks suspected of helping tax dodgers.
